title: Holistic Remote Care From Home in Broward County
description: Get natural treatment right at home with a Telemedicine Consultation in Broward County. Book an appointment for a remote herbal or functional medicine and care plan.
cleaned_text: County What can you expect from our Telemedicine Consultation in Broward County? Imagine being able to talk with your doctor through an app, instead of traveling all the way out into public for checkups. With telemedicine, you can book appointments online and have introductory or follow-up consultations with your physicians through a video platform like Zoom. How does our Telemedicine Consultation in Broward County work? In order to video chat with our physicians, you'll need the Lifesize application on your phone or computer. It is encrypted and free of charge. Once you book your Telemedicine consultation, you'll receive a confirmation text with your meeting link. You can click the link to open the meeting with your physician. As long as you have Lifesize downloaded on your phone or device, you'll be able to seamlessly open your meeting link and join. Be sure to use a phone with a camera, or a computer with a camera to enable the physician to see you. What services are available via Telemedicine? Herbal Consultation Herbs have been used for centuries to help the body heal itself. In our modern era, they're still an important part of healing and wellness programs all over the world because there's no better way than natural ingredients like herbs that can really work wonders on your health! We offer a telemedicine herbal consultation where you will be diagnosed by one doctor online to see what kind of herbal medicine would best suit YOU - just make sure to get ready with some questions so ask away during this initial online consultation for which you'll need access via laptop/computer camera. Functional Medicine Consultation ONLINE Functional medicine is an integrated, science-based approach to health care that uses advanced laboratory testing in order to analyze the genetic predispositions which influence our wellness. Nutritional balance plays a key role within this framework for optimal living as it can help prevent chronic disease and the aging process while also promoting youthfulness through various holistic practices including detox programs with vital supplements. Our initial telemedicine functional medicine consultation will be held in an online video conference, where a Physician will virtually consult with you, and develop a custom functional medicine protocol and treatment plan after your initial Advanced Laboratory Testing results are in. Please ensure that you have your laptop or computer camera enabled so that the Physician can see and treat you.
